attributes.action: improve youth awareness as the current system is not helping but increasing young crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Youth crime or ASBO for short is rising and many people are falling victim to abuse, especially people or race, age, appearance or of sexual preference.

We wish to improve not the problem but the reason why this happens by supporting a friendly environment for parents and to support a good standard of living to all children so that they don't have to develop into having to do crime.
